data.eml:eml: Two new species within the genus Seira Lubbock, 1869 from Morocco (Collembola, Entomobryidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Negri, Ilaria, Pellecchia, Marco, Fanciulli, Pietro Paolo (2005): Two new species within the genus Seira Lubbock, 1869 from Morocco (Collembola, Entomobryidae). Zootaxa 840: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.159509
